Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Sure here's a trendy summary paragraph combining both posts:

Title: People on social media are urging the Federal government to take action. One post highlights the importance of addressing inadequate payments and raising the rates to help people cover essential expenses. While another post calls out a Coachella attendee for their unethical behavior of not respecting consent.
